setup:
A consumer with income \(I=600\) has a utility function over two goods, \(x\) and \(y\): $$ u(x,y) = x^{ 1 / 2 }y^{ 1 / 2 } $$ The price of good \(x\) is \(p_x = 10 \) and the price of good \(y\) is \(p_y = 30 \).

Solve for the optimal consumption bundle of \(x\) and \(y\).
